data.message: Thanks for the opportunity to communicate with my past, present and future.

replies.message: Thanks for the birthday wishes, Joyce. We look forward to keeping you connected for years to come! -Natalie
help--how can we post our nice videos? Why are some people having problems with this?
me either, no share button, wth for 10 yrs old.
Happy birthday Facebook, you now have everyone from my family to almost everyone I know well online and connected :)
cant post mine either no share button driving me nuts i have tried everything
Great fun and opportunity to connect with all things that matter to me and my friends! Happy Birthday!
Thanks for keeping us connected to our families and friends even though me might be separate in miles or jobs.
Happy Birthday FaceBook, thank you for helping me stay closer to my kids and grandkids.  <3
Happy Bday FaceBook, Thank you for helping me stay closer to my familily!!!
Happy Birthday Facebook.  I get to stay in touch with more of my friends & family, many thanks to you!
Muchisimas felicidades por estos 10 años facebook y muchas gracias por toda la diversion q nos brindas y por permitir contactarnos con nuestas amistades, conocidos y familia...Feliz Día...
Thank you for letting me meet people from all over the world. I don't have friends near by so this is a blessing for me. <3 hope I'm here the next 10 years !!
